website_summaries.verdict: Whether the bristles are actually badger fur or not, this may not concern you if you need a durable brush for a low price.
pros: Offers features you may not expect for such an inexpensive price, including sturdy bristles that resist shedding, solid wood handle, and a money-back guarantee
cons: Bristles are on the stiff side, and feel as if they may not be made of 100% genuine badger hair

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months
customer_reviews.text: My first shaving brush. Works great. I'm happy with my purchase and I would purchase again. Update: after 3.5 months of use the glue that holds the brush to the handle disintegrated cause irreparable damage. The brush head separated from the handle. Was a great brush till it broke. Because of the breaking after only three months of use. I'm taking this down from a 5 star review to a 1 star review. If it lasted a year, I'd leave it at 5 stars, but only 3.5 months? That's not that great. Especially considering I only shave twice a week at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Pic of delivery - thought order was lost! AWESOME brush!
customer_reviews.text: 1st must say that in tracking my order, the photo of where it was on my porch is just way beyond awesome!! (not the first time with the photo experience, but SO helpful!) My hubby always had skin issues shaving with today's stuff ... but going back to the 'old-fashioned' brush and 'soap' solved everything! This brush is SO soft I might have to get one for myself! Just got it, he hasn't used it yet (and believe me, he is very particular & highly critical of things), but so far, ladies, if your man doesn't like it, you will! I'm going to have to order one for myself (for make-up application)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly say it is a great brush.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brush for several months. I can honestly say it is a great brush.. There will be a few bristles come loose (I pull them out when they stick up a little). I am not gentle on this brush. after I shave, I vigorously wash and dry it with a towel. I think for the money, this little brush would be hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helps maintain a good shave.
customer_reviews.text: First off many people keep asking if it’s Badger or Boar. It is not, this is synthetic hair. I will tell you that it works just like the Badger ones. It helps lather your face for a good shave. I was the type of person who would go and buy shaving cream every two weeks because my hair grows in so quick. For the price you pay it is a very good lather brush. I also paired it with the Sir Hare shaving soap and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: High quality brush for the price
customer_reviews.text: This brush is made with quality craftsmanship and quality materials. Bristles don't fall out and the bristles do not disconnect from the handle. Holds water well and sheds water easily. Mixes the soap fast and efficiently too. If you want a brush that will give you a great lather with good shave soap then this is the one you want. If it's not giving you a good lather you're either not doing it right or the shave soap is low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Gift for father
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father as everyday use. He doesn't like to complain. He said it was very small like a makeup brush but he uses it and said it works well. It was my mistake thinking it was a regular size. Gave 4 stars because of my mistake not Amazon's or the seller's and he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Statzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice when used with regular razors also
customer_reviews.text: First time buyer of a product like this but it's seems really nice, gets a nice lather with the soap I bought with it. It's really soft but still stiff enough. I cut myself ever time I use the straight razor so I'm going back to regular razors. This and the soap give a nice lather for regular razors so I will probably continue to use this and the soap instead of shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shaving brush
customer_reviews.text: I am new to shaving brushes, so I cannot speak to thos product in comparison with the competition, but it suits all my needs handily, and for very little money. An experienced user may give better technical review, but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: 2 for 1 is a go
customer_reviews.text: I got the 2 for 1 deal and gave one to my buddy. We both are enjoying these brushes. For the price? It’s a good deal! They are not the softest brush I have yet soft enough to still feel nice. My soap lathered up nicely on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for just under a month and So far, so good. I only shave my neck every two days so it’s not getting really hard use. I’ve never had any higher end brush to compare to, but I can say this one does just fine. It’s only lost a few hairs, but it isn’t really a big deal. It builds lather ok and works the lather into my beard hairs quite well.
customer_reviews.author: J. C

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a Great Shave
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush as it makes shaving enjoyable. The bristles are soft and seem to be of superior quality. My only issue is I wish it came with a type of traveling case or a holder to put this in to help let it dry quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a soft brush. The finish is less than ideal. The handle appears as if it was partially touching the table because only half of the head was unfinished. However this was an economy purchase and it’s a decent value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I've owned
customer_reviews.text: So I have owned 3 brushes with this my third. I've waited to review to ensure I didn't have any surprises with this brush. But I like the hair used for the brush, and I have not lost one bristle. My last two brushes, I would have lost at least 12 or so by now. But not this one. Does its job well! I would get one again.
customer_reviews.author: Pookie Finklestein

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush
customer_reviews.text: Got this brush for my husband to replace one that he had for years that finally broke. He loves it. The brush is soft and perfect. The handle is one piece so not falling apart. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R

customer_reviews.title: Small in size, but good in quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's stiffer than my old one, which I like, and a little small, which I don;t like as much. The handle is small for my hand, and small enough that it doesn't fit well into my brush stand, it often falls out. But it's a decent brush.
customer_reviews.author: Carriemyl

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes it
customer_reviews.text: He's an old fashioned shaver, but doesn't take it with him out of town. He often uses hair conditioner or just plain soap suds. But he's a brush and mug guy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performance
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brush and I definitely use this one most often- I even travel with this brush. It performs very well, seems to be well made, and has held up well since purchase. I highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Oister

customer_reviews.title: False
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the gate the add is a lie. The brush is synthetic, not a natural hair in the knot. To be fair, it does lather well. I have not had any hairs fall out, and the knot seems well glued.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore DiMisa

customer_reviews.title: Good, soft brush!
customer_reviews.text: Just a little smaller than my previous. I suppose easier to travel with. I hope it lasts. Performed very well on the first shave. Very soft to the face but with good hair-spring.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Not badger's hair.
customer_reviews.text: The product was inexpensive and arrived very quickly but is definitely NOT badger's hair (or any kind of natural bristle). It has plastic bristles. I tried it anyway and after a few days it went into the trash. It didn't build a lather and trying to put it on your face is like using a paint brush. Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Wilken

customer_reviews.title: Eh. It'll do for under $10. Buyer beware, synthetic bristles, not real hair.
customer_reviews.text: Not real hair. It's all synthetic. False advertising on the listing. Pro: because the bristles are fake they are more firm and brush like, similar to a toothbrush. So it's firm. Con: not real hair as advertised. Doesn't lather as well as real brushes since it doesn't hold water well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Ok brush if you don't expect too much..
customer_reviews.text: Brush works up a decent lather, but is somewhat short on bristles. Not up to the quality I've enjoyed in other brushes. Would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality +
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good product, well made and works better than others I have tried. Soft, absorbs and holds water and creates maximum shaving soap suds thick and creamy and 3/4 sized which is great for traveling !! This is a great brush !!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M.

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY! DO NOT ORDER
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and purchased this to put in my travel bag. I own another badger shaving brush, and this is not that! It is a cheap version of a bunch of brush hair, but it is not a badger brush! If you use actual shaving cream that needs a brush, do not order this! It is flimsy, does not lather well, and is just down right garbage. DO NOT ORDER!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty okay. Very okay for the money. It lathers the soap and works it into the hair. And the bristles are natural, though I couldn't tell you the difference between badger and cat whisker.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: best shave ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush and the Lather and Wood shaving soap. I can't believe how smooth and easy it is. Also--my family has been trying to cut down and stupid packaging--this old fashioned method of shaving is the best on that score too.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: This product will fail within 2-3 weeks of use. First, water cracks the handle. Second, the glue gives way and the brush comes out of the handle. I bought a second with the same result. I was able to get a refund on the second one, but I’d to eat the expense of the first one.
customer_reviews.author: FDubya

customer_reviews.title: smaller than other brushes.
customer_reviews.text: The brush was somewhat smaller than my Van der Hagen brushes and the bristles are stiffer. the stiffness of the bristles didn't not stop the brush from delivering lather from my mug to my face however, it took a little more work. overall, not a bad brush but I prefer my Van der Hagen brushes because of their size.
customer_reviews.author: GRAYWOLF

customer_reviews.title: super soft brush
customer_reviews.text: The softness feels great on the face, but a little more stiffness would help work up a lather in the cup. I like it a lot though and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: WAN

customer_reviews.title: i love badger shaving brushes
customer_reviews.text: i love badger shaving brushes. this is my third and this is my favourite of all. the fact this is the third- says the others didnt last. main problem with these is that the hair from the brush dislodge very easy. i cant believe that not a single hair from the brush has dislodged until now. also its super soft. this brush is A+
customer_reviews.author: eyescapes

customer_reviews.title: A little too small!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this even after reading about the small size of the brush. Hoping it would fit into small hands but expected too much. Brush head too small to hold it comfortably between the fingers. Because of this, it cannot hold much lather and so most of the lather is wasted. In fact, your fingers perhaps do a better job than this brush. Technically you are getting what you pay for as this seems to be one of the cheapest brushes on Amazon. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good brush
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the brushes from 'China'mart, but got tired of a face full of bristles. This is so much softer, and if you take care of it, should last quite awhile. Will buy again if needs be.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Carr

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. He said that he loves the brush and it is great quality. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not real badger hair
customer_reviews.text: Brush is made from nylon not bad your hair completely false advertising
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Brush Up on your Shaving!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this while on vacation (having forgotten to pack one). It’s FAR better than the brush it was intended to substitute temporarily - not a single hair has fallen out yet and it dries quickly and cleanly - totally happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: A.I.

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving brush
customer_reviews.text: Best one I have ever had, glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Russell C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time, is as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality, and as good as I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service great product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the handle and the hairs of the brush do not come out like brushes I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: BOBBY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good onee. time will tell. some others began to lose hair after 6 mos.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Ideal shaving.
customer_reviews.text: Value. This item is a value buy. Takes a bit of breaking in then does a nice job. There may be better badger bristle brushes out there but they'll cost a lot more. This one is functional and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: dean guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like
customer_reviews.text: It was just so cheap made returned item and got a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not natural hair / Not hand crafted
customer_reviews.text: Not natural hair of any kind. I suppose the guy that glued the knot to the handle counts as "hand crafting" but in general its crap. A tuxedo knot brush is like $8 more. Just buy that instead.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are hard to find in our local stores. This one is excellent quality and a great price. Would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron&Kristie Wall

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: To long and hard to lather up with...Not enough NYLON bristles. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Taylor

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: weather or not it is real for the price its nice and soft. i cant tell if it is real or fake but i would say buy it
customer_reviews.author: kathy weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for shaving cream or soap .
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for apply soap on to his face when he shaves . We have had it about a month and he really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kostakis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product/would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product for the price. I have purchased this before but you must make sure that you hang it bristle down to dry to prolong longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: The best brush you can buy for the money! I will never buy another brush again. This is the one!
customer_reviews.author: chase

customer_reviews.title: I’m new to this type of shaving and this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to this type of shaving and this is my first brush. For the price you cannot beat it, though it is not badger hair. That part is irritating. I’ve used it for almost 5 months now and the back end of the brush is starting to crack. No issues with the knot. But again, for a beginning brush, it was worth it to me
customer_reviews.author: DFA

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and sturdy handle.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t have a case or cover for it. The plastic container it came in was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Melo

customer_reviews.title: True comfort
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in yesterday's mail, and I used it for the first time this morning. WOW ! I had forgotten how GOOD a quality shaving brush can feel and perform. I know they don't last forever, but if I ever need another one, I will buy it from you !
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I make and sell pottery shaving bowls and customers are ...
customer_reviews.text: I make and sell pottery shaving bowls and customers are asking me to bundle brushes with the bowls. After much research, I picked these because they cannot be beat from a price/features standpoint. It's a very attractive item but I have not used it myself but it sold right away! I will be purchasing many more!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brush for about two weeks now, and I have found that it has a good feel, and it works fine, but the soap doesn't really load properly until the second pass. I have found that it also drips a lot on that first pass. It is softer than my boar bristle brush, but since buying it (mostly for the price point, I freely admit), I haven't found any additional information anywhere about the manufacturer, Bassion. All of this leads me to have concerns about whether or not it is truly a 100% badger brush as advertised. It does its job, but not horribly and not exceptionally.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Dufour

customer_reviews.title: Broke While I was Gently Drying it
customer_reviews.text: Brushes came out of handle on the 10th use or so. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fairfax Thunder

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: My dad needed a new shaving brush and this one makes him very happy. He is able to get a good lather with his “old fashioned” shaving soap. Arrived quickly! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it for weapon cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I use it to dust off my weapons after being out in the field all day. Habits from when I was in Active duty US Army. Works great as I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Badger brush feels great and lathers up very well
customer_reviews.text: Badger brush feels great and lathers up very well. I'm glad to have purchased this brush over some other brushes that are way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: First one I’ve ever had or used. I like it
customer_reviews.author: ben harrison

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Effective. Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly like you'd imagine. great with foam shaving cream, just does exactly what you buy it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas A. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Soft but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This brush is soft on the skin yet sturdy enough to apply lather consistently. Used with shaving gel and soap. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Soft and gentle on the face.  Thank you.  Nice craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes the softness of the boar bristles on his face. Nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: the price was right
customer_reviews.text: Too tiny and flimsy to use every day,went back to my old brush.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to a larger brush, but for what I paid I'm totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: H. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good brush hair but fell apart on the second week
customer_reviews.text: The brush is good, hair is medium sturdy and massaging face with it leaves good feeling. This was my first try to switch to shaving brushes. I started to enjoy my shaving, waking up earlier all excited about upcoming “ritual”. However, after about 5 shaves, the brush fell apart (see the picture). I can now fix it with the glue I guess, but... c’mon “you had one job”.
customer_reviews.author: Petr Gusev

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It's my first shaving brush and for the price, you can't beat it. I think I have one bristle come out while shaving in the past 3 weeks, so no issue there. For some reason I expected it to be larger but after using it I feel the size is perfect especially if you wanted to use it as a travel brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Well made but noticeably "tighter", "stiffer" than what I am used to with other brushes. Lathers OK.. Not unpleasant to use... just quiet different.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that it's smaller than I imagined but that's a consumer error on my part because I must have missed the size explanation. I bought this as a stocking stuffer for my husband and it seems like it will be perfect. The packaging was nice and it looks like great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and works as needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first shaving brush so keep that in mind, but I feel like it works as I expected. A bit smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Garrahan

customer_reviews.title: Good guality - Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Love shaving with a brush and mug. No hairs falling out and getting stuck to my beard (yet) :-)
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Junk Critic

customer_reviews.title: Quality Brush
customer_reviews.text: Been using the brush every other day since I bought it May 2017 and it's holding up pretty well. I clean the brush pretty well after each use and use a brush/shaver stand to dry. The brush is soft and appears to be pure badger fur as stated. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied with the brush, it is better than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: July

customer_reviews.title: NOT badger bristles
customer_reviews.text: Nice, durable wooden body, but the bristles are plastic and not of any animal origin: the bristles melt before burning; top apparently dyed, base of bristles slightly transparent, not opaque as a hair would be; bristles are both shorter and stiffer than those found on a bonafide badger bristle brush.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L Woodley

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush. Makes a good lather and seems to me well made.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Embry

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for your man in your life or for men who want a great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: So so soft. Great amazing quality! Doesnt shead at all! Highly recommend. Oh and great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Great starter brush
customer_reviews.text: Great starter brush! So far I like it and you sure can't beat the price! I don't have experience with the more expensive brushes so only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Poor Boy Muzzleloaders

customer_reviews.title: dont shave without this
customer_reviews.text: allow you to coat your face and gets the best shave
customer_reviews.author: john litwak

customer_reviews.title: Must have for proper shave
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft brush that helps lift facial hair and spread the shave gel or cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does not leave strands of fiber on your face or head. creates a nice foam and exfoliates at the same time. Great service by the seller also. Arrive on time, perfectly packaged. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: guyzo

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Great. Price is Incredible for this Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have had 2 different ones in the past; this one tops them all. It feels smooth on the face. The best one I have ever had. Looks exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: SysAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time in my life that I've used a shave brush, and I really like it. The bristles are soft and hold the soap very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. Husband likes it. Practical. No frills necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Brockett

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality than I expected. It makes shaving by head everyday easier. So soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best brush iv ever had
customer_reviews.text: Berry well made works great will order another for my dad
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great way to replace all the chemical shaving creams
customer_reviews.text: Great way to replace all the chemical shaving creams. I create shaving lotion using our bar of Bonner's bar soap. Works great and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badger??  Really??
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are very uniform and stiff--unlike any badger brush I have ever used--seems synthetic
customer_reviews.author: gail freeman

customer_reviews.title: It has worked so far.
customer_reviews.text: It is the only brush of its kind I have used so I have nothing to compare it to but It does seem to work, and has lasted multiple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: prestige at the right price
customer_reviews.text: Typical badger brush but at the best price on the market. its a little light in weight and leaves a little to be desired but is stilll a quality shaving tool.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: It is holding up well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every two days. It is seems like it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Morocco

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than i expected for the price. I use my shaving brush every day and am very pleased with it. I use Bigelow shave cream in the tube, and a little dab in my palm is all I need with this brush for a fantastic shave.
customer_reviews.author: MA Toal

customer_reviews.title: Badger Shaving
customer_reviews.text: It was just as I hoped. So nice I just may use it on myself rather than the craft progject I bought it for...lol Will have to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: creative

customer_reviews.title: good brush
customer_reviews.text: excellent brush lathers well the badger that died to provide this brush was well served and will be long remembered though he or she is not overly thrilled about the whole situation
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Badgers :(
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean my keyboard and trackball. Works better than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: OhNo

customer_reviews.title: washes and dries easily.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is very well made. Doesn't seem to lose hairs despite constant use, washes and dries easily.
customer_reviews.author: Skribbs

customer_reviews.title: Shave brush
customer_reviews.text: Only use 100% badger bristle brush. Man made doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Don

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different products for shaving. This brush is awful. It fell apart within a day of using. Extremely cheap material and not worth the money. Spend a few extra dollars and get a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A#1
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for a year and still works great
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Herbert

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for as a Father's day gift. Per dad it was perfect and the shaving soap went on perfect and smooth. Loved the brush- now he would like the little stand that holds
customer_reviews.author: Bratzella

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece. I've used it about a month now ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. I've used it about a month now and no hair has fallen out. It looks great, works great and has a pleasant smell when using it. I will definitely be ordering another one of these. Highly recommend and the price is very good too!
customer_reviews.author: M Bendz

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush , but very small
customer_reviews.text: The shaving cream brush is very Well made, very soft, however it is on the small size. Much smaller than my previous brush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bassion Shaving Soap Brush
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable grip. The bristles do not shed. Easily rinsed.
customer_reviews.author: TobyG

product_meta.title: Bassion Hand Crafted 100% Pure Badger Shaving Brush with Hard Wood Handle, Men's Luxury Professional Hair Salon Tool, Engineered to Deliver the Best Shave of Your Life
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY MATERIALS: The shaving brush made of 100% pure badger hair bristles, not nylon or other cheaper, synthetic and less effective materials. With a real solid wooden handle; Meticulously designed to serve you for years or even more.

GENTLY EXFOLIATES SKIN: This brush is extremely dense and soft enough to feel smooth on your skin while still getting the job done. Brings water to the face for a true wet shave. Creates a rich and warm lather, give you a comfortable shave experience.

EASY AND COMFORTABLE TO USE: Incredibly soft and looked; Has an ergonomic shape which makes holding comfortable; 4 inches long total; the knot size (where the bristles go into the handle) is 2cm. A good size for all hands.
PERFECT AS A GIFT: Our badger shaving brush package comes in an easy to gift wrap clear box. This nice designed little brush would make an excellent gift for any man or the man in your life.

LIFETIME RISK FREE GUARANTEED: Your purchase is fully protected when you order today. All of our products come with a MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE. If you're not 100% satisfied, we'll give you 100% of your money back, no questions asked. Absolutely no hassle and no risk on your part.
